title: Oru Kural Ketkuthu Song Lyrics Vazhakku Enn 18/9
stanzas: <div>Oru Kural Ketkuthu Song Lyrics Vazhakku Enn 18/9

Oru kural kaetkudhu penne
uyir vidum munne
undhan kadhil kaettiduma
kaettidumaa

oru alai adikkudhu penne
karai thodum munne
undhan kaigal theendidumaa
theendidumaa

manakadhavu thirandhidumaa
modhi naanum paarkiren
pazhagidumaa vilagidumaa
kanavilum ninaivilum

Oru kural kaetkudhu penne
uyir vidum munne
undhan kadhil kaettiduma
kaettidumaa

oru alai adikkudhu penne
karai thodum munne
undhan kaigal theendidumaa
theendidumaa

Mudhal mural mazhai megam
endhan vaasal maele
manam indru eeramaagi
baaram aagudhe

idhazh varai varum varthai
undhan paarvaiyaale
idam vittu thadam maari
thooram pogudhe

thanimaiyil theeyinai
theendi theendi naanum
kaayathodu vaadum verathil

vizhigalil varamena
edhiril neeyum vandhaai
vazha thondruthe

unmugam paarkkayil
kannile thaai mugam
varuvadhu yaenadi
unnidam enna naan
vendugiren

Oru kural kaetkudhu penne
uyir vidum munne
undhan kadhil kaettiduma
kaettidumaa

Thodaamale thottu pesum
moochu kaatrin vaasam.
vidaamale ennai indru
kooru poduthe

padaamale pattu pogum
pattu pondra kaesam
ezhaamale ennai veelthi
vendru poguthe

uravugal pirivena
vazhndhu vandhapodhu
vaanavillai kaatti pogiraai

erimalaiyin naduvinil
paniyai pola vandhu
veesip pogiraai

unakkena thandhida
ennidam uyarvena
edhuvum illlaiye

uyiraiye tharugiren
kanmaniye..

Oru kural kaetkudhu penne
uyir vidum munne
undhan kadhil kaettiduma
kaettidumaa

oru alai adikkudhu penne
karai thodum munne
undhan kaigal theendidumaa
theendidumaa
